text: Gordon Angus Deayton (born 6 January 1956) is an English actor, television presenter, writer, musician, comedian, and broadcaster. He was the original presenter of the BBC satirical panel game show Have I Got News for You. He was fired from the show in October 2002, after more negative tabloid articles about his personal life. From 2007 to 2008, he was the host of the BBC One British comedy panel show Would I Lie to You?. He also played Victor Meldrew's long-suffering neighbour Patrick Trench in the BBC One comedy series One Foot in the Grave (1990–2000), and George Windsor in the final three series of the BBC One school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2013–2015). ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English television presenters Category:20th-century English writers Category:English musicians Category:English comedians Category:Game show hosts Category:Actors from Surrey Category:21st-century English writers
title: Angus Deayton
